name: Project Time Thief: Browser Movement Course
name_original: Project Time Thief: Browser Movement Course
description:
This is a demo of sorts made for the purpose of being playable on browser. It was originally made in Unreal 5.0 for my project Project: Time Thief but was copy and pasta'd down to Unreal 4.23 so it could be on browser. I put this together very quick so it lacks character art but the sound should give you a good idea. Have fun trying to reach the top. It is intentionally hard to try and test the games mechanics. Project Time Thief is still in development and has a more detailed explanation on my portfolio linked below. Enjoy!

Controls

Move - WASD

Look Around - Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Double Jump - Spacebar

Vault - Spacebar

Dash - E

Crouch* - C

Sprint* - X or Toggle with Mouse Wheel

Slide - Press C when going fast

Wall Run - Jump next to a wall

Load Last Checkpoint - L

*some controls are not available on browser and were changed (shift and ctrl)
